alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 5:30PM EST until February 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Whitewater River at Brookville. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Brookville. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, lowland flooding can be expected near Cedar Grove and New Trenton, with lowland flooding also occurring in West Harrison, Indiana and Harrison, Ohio. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.4 feet Friday morning. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
